Chapter 7 Data Quality Monitoring Report If survey teams are collecting data with Kobo, Ona, MoDa, ODK and sending their submissions to a server on a regular basis, then we can generate a data quality report with R to regularly track survey results and detect problems that may arise in the field with data collection. 7.1 Overview video 7.2 Data Quality Monitoring Tools 7.2.1 Example data set 7.2.2 Example data quality report
